title: Posts not showing up?
content:
I have just tried to make a few posts but they do not show up afterwards. Looking at the Forums page, it shows my name as most recent poster but the posts are not visable ? Whaahhzup?

ChrisL

PS: I see making a new thread works but adding to an old thread takes your post into the great unknown.

Looks like the last post showing up was about 10 hours ago. Hang in there Christian! You have yet to even get your first cup of coffee and "the site" is freakin' on you :-)  
Have a doughnut first. You work better on unhealthy junk food than stuff like whole wheat grains.
author: dezcom
